intro: Hieracium mataeum, commonly known as the Mataeum hawkweed, is a flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its daisy-like flowers, which typically range in color from yellow to orange. The plant has basal leaves that are usually lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs. It thrives in open, sunny habitats such as meadows and grasslands. Hieracium mataeum is native to parts of Europe and is often found in temperate climates.
